info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 21 at 12:31AM CDT until July 21 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS St Louis MO
info.description:
FFWLSX
The National Weather Service in St Louis has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northern Fayette County in south central Illinois...
* Until 300 AM CDT.
* At 1231 AM CDT, Broadcast media and law enforcement report thunderstorms producing heavy rain in northern Fayette County. Between 7 and 8 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 2 inches in 1 hour. Flash flooding is already occurring.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Broadcast media reported.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Vandalia, St. Elmo, Ramsey, Brownstown, Wrights Corner, Avena, Shafter, Bingham, Bayle City and St. James.
This includes the following State Parks... Ramsey Lake State Park.
This includes Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 61 and 76.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 3:00 AM CDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 3:00 AM CDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 21 at 12:31AM CDT until July 21 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS St Louis MO

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 3:00 AM CDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 3:00 AM CDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
